attributes.action: People Of Herne Bay that Love The Town and It's History
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The politicians are planning to close our museum, please support this campaign we cannot allow the demolition of something else in our High Street. Herne Bay is a wonderful town with an amazing history, our museum is small and very well run, our local council is filled with greed and invested in Iceland, guess what their investment is our loss.

SUPPORT THE CAMAPIGN SAVE HERNE BAY MUSEUM

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
